note.p: Career: Proprietor of the Estates of Muirhouse and Hatton, Mid-Lothian, NB.
Freemason, Member, Lodge of Felicity No 58
Memberships: FGS; Member of various Foreign Societies in France, Germany, and Belgium; Vice President Palaeontographical Society
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1885 vol 39 pp viii-xi signed by R E
References: The Library and Museum of Freemasonry 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' 2010, page 26
